commandDescription: Opens the Deployment Status page in the target org.
idFlagDescription: Optional: Provide an id of a validation or deployment to be taken directly to the specific deployment status page.
urlonlyFlagDescription: Optional:(Default: false) If provided the page will not be opened in a browser it will just be printed in the terminal.
displayurlFlagDescription: Optional:(Default: false) If provided the url will be printed in the terminal.
classicFlagDescription: Optional:(Default: false) If provided the page will be opened in the Classic UI. Default is Lightning UI.
